MonsterTrait.Name: Shapechanger
MonsterTrait.Text: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Medium snake, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting (Yuanti Form Only)
MonsterTrait.Text:
The yuanti's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). The yuanti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: animal friendship (snakes only) 3/day: suggestion

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Malison Type
MonsterTrait.Text:
The yuanti has one of the following types:
Type 1: Human body with snake head Type 2: Human head and body with snakes for arms Type 3: Human head and upper body with a serpentine lower body instead of legs

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack (Yuanti Form Only)
MonsterTrait.Text: The yuanti makes two bite attacks using its snake arms.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.
